name: Lorenzo Orio

projects.title: Wiser Plus üìö
projects.description: An open-source browser extension for a quick professor and course rating look up, directly in the school system when signing up for new classes using Typescript, Plasmo and RateMyProff API. With over 60 active users on the Chrome Store.

projects.title: Water Hub üíß
projects.description: A project developed on the ESP32 platform that makes the fridge and life smarter. Built to automatically fill up anything me and my roommates use to drink and track the intake of the fluids. Thanks to a Firebase database and a Web-App, it provides outside-the-house tracking, feedback, and visualization of intake to always stay on track with water consumption.

projects.title: Parrot ü¶úüè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è
projects.description: An open-source browser extension developed on Plasmo for media enthusiasts that easily provides trailers, multiple reviews, posters, and much more withing the websites. Specifically designed to work on multiple torrents websites. The extension also comes with other features such as bad file detection, UHD detection, and more, these features can be easily set by the user to make the experience more personalized. I do not host any copyrighted material I only use publicly available data.

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

aboutpara:
I‚Äôm a computer science student with a passion for turning innovative ideas into reality. I love merging software and hardware to create interactive experiences that people can genuinely enjoy. My interests span automation, cybersecurity, data science, and web development‚Äîif it‚Äôs tech, I‚Äôm all in. 
 When I‚Äôm not tinkering with gadgets or code, you‚Äôll find me behind a camera, capturing moments as they happen. I‚Äôm also into cars‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs exploring the latest automotive tech or just hitting the road, I enjoy the thrill of seeing machines in action. For me, it‚Äôs all about making stuff work and enjoying the results, whether it‚Äôs in a project, a photo, or under the hood.

experiences.position: Software Lab Intern @ Academy of Digital Odontostomatology (AIOD)
experiences.bullets: Created and helped project-manage over 100 dental surgery cases utilizing software like Exocad and 3Shape. , Collaborated with a team of doctors and patients to ensure 100% of issues were identified early and solutions found in a proactive manner.

experiences.position: Software Engineering Tutor @ University Of Massachusetts Boston
experiences.bullets: Supervised 30 students per week by actively tracking improvements design and development of both software and the students to deliver functional software projects. , Held weekly group session boosting teamwork and collaborative learning by at least 50%.

experiences.position: Course Assistant for Data Structures and Algorithms @ University Of Massachusetts Boston
experiences.bullets: Assisting 60 students 4 times a week in learning data structure, syntax, and algorithms in Python and Java. ,  Assisting in visualizing and approaching complex problems. Held interactive office hours increasing attendance by 20% and boosting students grades.

activities.bullets: Organized and ran UMASS Boston Hackathon as technical lead planner reaching over 120 participants.
